content.body: Question for engine vendors: can we reveal the loader hooks of the host to guest code? https://github.com/tc39/proposal-compartments/issues/63
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Question for engine vendors: can we reveal the loader hooks of the host to guest code? https://github.com/tc39/proposal-compartments/issues/63

content.body: My intuition is “maybe?” The loadHook is basically fetch + compile.
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: My intuition is “maybe?” The loadHook is basically fetch + compile.

content.body: Some loader hooks exist in Node.js https://nodejs.org/api/esm.html#hooks
content.org.matrix.msc1767.text: Some loader hooks exist in Node.js https://nodejs.org/api/esm.html#hooks

content.body: Ah, this hints at James Browning’s suggestion of passing `defaultLoadHook` as an argument.
content.formatted_body: Ah, this hints at James Browning’s suggestion of passing defaultLoadHook as an argument.
